text: My husband and I have moved 19 times in our 31 years of marriage, we have always loved the home we lived in and have renovated, improved and decorated each one to our taste. We are currently living in rented whilst we wait for our new build to be completed (house number 20, and we are in our 50‚Äôs).

text: You have one of the most beautiful houses I‚Äôve ever seen. It is perfection in every detail. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm so surprised that you are searching for a new one.  When displaying your new Vitamin capsules you said that ‚ÄúI hope these give me the life I want‚Äù. I think any one of us would choose the life you already have. Trips to the Maldives, a stunning wardrobe, your own clothing line. I would wish for you that at some point you will be so happy with your life that you will no longer require more. I know that you are ambitious person and I respect that ambition but ‚Äúmore‚Äù does not always mean ‚Äúbetter‚Äù. Regards

text: I used to have an office on my property, and it was actually the worst thing I could have done as work/home life started to merge, and I ended up having a burnout three years later. Now I keep work and home separate, and I have never felt so good. I am sure you have thought about having an office space completely away from your home (i.e., not on your property), and ultimately you need to do what is best for you but do consider keeping the two separate as you may end up wanting to move again because of it. And congratulations on the new launch. It is gorgeous!

text:
Goodness me, so many negative comments on here from their marriage to moving.
Look, sometimes people build beautiful houses and settle for life, sometimes they get their first house (and I say first house because this is free standing) and live in it and see the things that they want or need and even get that renovation bug - it‚Äôs jussstttt like the travel bug . My husband and I brought our first house, renovated and we adored it, people couldn‚Äôt understand when we sold. But that was always the aim. We brought another house and we‚Äôre currently knocking it down and rebuilding. We may stay there for a long time we may on sell. Don‚Äôt know yet. Sometimes people enjoy the process of renovating and moving, and to be quite honest, if we didn‚Äôt sell our house I‚Äôd be changing it up because the me that started renovating have little to no idea, but the me now is very focussed and knows what she likes, much like Lydia (and yes we painted the house 3 times in 10 years!) . Gosh my mum didn‚Äôt move a lot but far out she changed up the house so much. So basically all I‚Äôm saying is, you don‚Äôt know, you see a snippet, people are different. And Lydia, I get it, and don‚Äôt worry about the comments, people will always have something to say.

I have been waiting ages for this collection and the white dress I was going to wear at my wedding. I had signed up to the early access and was on the site at exactly 3 pm. I was so delighted when I bagged my dresses to get my heart broken later to say they were actually gone. If it was your first collection I would have understood better however this is your 3rd‚Ä¶4th? text:
Take your tablets in yogurt.  I have to take 16 in the a.m. and 6 in evening
I always take them with yogurt
Unfortunately I have to take them as I was diagnosed with inoperable stage 4 cancer female parts and up entire spine. No, I am not devastated  although I just retired and moved to Florida 2 years ago the tumors on my spine pressing my nerves paralyzed me from the waist down so although the beautiful Gulf of Mexico is just 5 miles away I will never walk the beach again or pick up a colorful sea shell. I love watching your channel all your gorgeous clothes that blouse with puffy sleeves is so me so I'm happy to see it on you.  I don't get sad or depressed I have a strong belief in God and this journey has brought many kind caring medical workers into my life I treasure their kindness
